mapper.select: select * from v_wfsystemuser t1 where wfsystemuserid=#{id}

mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFSYSTEMUSERID, t1.WFSYSTEMUSERNAME FROM T_SRFWFSYSTEMUSER t1
SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WFSYSTEMUSERID`, t1.`WFSYSTEMUSERNAME` FROM `T_SRFWFSYSTEMUSER` t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFSYSTEMUSERID, t1.WFSYSTEMUSERNAME FROM T_SRFWFSYSTEMUSER t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFSYSTEMUSERID AS WFSYSTEMUSERID, t1.WFSYSTEMUSERNAME AS WFSYSTEMUSERNAME FROM T_SRFWFSYSTEMUSER t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFSYSTEMUSERID AS WFSYSTEMUSERID, t1.WFSYSTEMUSERNAME AS WFSYSTEMUSERNAME FROM T_SRFWFSYSTEMUSER t1
SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[WFSYSTEMUSERID], t1.[WFSYSTEMUSERNAME] FROM [T_SRFWFSYSTEMUSER] t1
